msbt.message: Seeing how I came all this way, I can't help but think it would be nice to take something home with me. Something unique to impress my friends Perhaps a souvenir to prove I was here. I've got it! How about made right here?
I'll make it for you.
Eh, I dunno.
My word, really?! I couldn't possibly say no to such a kind offer. Ooooh, I can't wait to see your masterpiece.Now, I must return home tomorrow. I do hope you can get it back to me today, .
Aren't you a peach, ! Thank you! My friends will be GREEN with envy when they see it! I do have a recipe for crafting , so I'll give it to you now.
Oh dear! Your pockets are full. You'll have to make some room, darling, and then come back.
But I must tell you, there's one teensy little thing I'm only here today. That means I must ask you to craft my souvenir as soon as possible! Terribly sorry for the rush.

Oh! I see. Well, I still think it would make a wonderful souvenirand make me the envy of my friends. I can see it in my home now attracting attentionand so many compliments Ah well, I suppose this can dream, .
Ah, you made room in your pockets, did you? Then please take this recipe for my .
Oh, have you changed your mind? The we discussedwill you craft it for moi?
I will!
Uh, no.
Haha, I'm just teasing you, my dear. Though, if you DO change your mind, I'll be here all day.
Have you gathered everything you need? I can't wait to see my new !
It's coming along.
It's not working out.
I'm terribly glad to hear that. I thought you might have come back to tell me it wasn't going to happen. I'm so glad I asked you for help, .
Aww, I see. It was too much to ask after all. I should know a one-day delivery is out of the question. These things happen, I suppose. Don't you worry about it, .
Did you know that a certain someone is making me a fabulous souvenir to take home as a memento?It's going to drive my friends WILD with envy when they see my new !
Oooh, did you finish crafting my fab souvenir? Be a dear and don't drag this out! Tell me, !
It's ready!
It'll be a little longer.
Please, darling, I want to give you as a token of my gratitude.
Another job well done, my dear.You really must accept for all your troubles.
Of course, I must return the favor. I insist you have , darling.
The anticipation is killing me! It's worse than waiting for a big shoe sale, darling! Anyhoo, I'll be waiting here, imagining what your masterpiece will look like.
Wonderful! Simply WONDERFUL! And so very authentic to this island! I promise to cherish my fabulous forever.
Ahhh, yet another masterpiece to add to my collection!Of course, this piece will be given a place of prominence in my collection. It deserves nothing less.
All this authentic goodness! My friends back home will be terribly impressed. These mementos from my journey they will forever hold a special place in my heartand my home.
Hmm? What was that about, ?
Come now, stop teasing me, !

You fabulous thing, you! You have helped me make some truly splendid memories here. But, I cannot let this island become nothing more than a memory. I feel I MUST return, . If I am ever invited here again, the answer will most certainly be, "Yes!" So do invite me again.

This souvenir is lovely, but what's even more lovely is the generosity I've experienced here. I can only hope I'll have another opportunity to visit this island. So do invite me to camp here again. Perhaps then I'll truly understand what it is that makes this place so special, .

A handmade item is wonderful, but knowing it was made on THIS islandwhy, it's even more special. I can't tell you how much I've loved watching my collection grow bit by bit each time I've visited. Hmm, if I lived here for good Oh dear, my collection would surely grow out of control, .
I want you to know that the you made for me Why, it is PROOF you have excellent taste! Don't you dare let anyone tell you otherwise, .

I don't want to toot my own horn or anything, but a certain island resident made
just for little ol' me! When everyone finds out, surely I'll be the talk of the island!
